phrase.item: This is the sign of Aries, a happy New Year to you all.
It is time to clean, a happy New Year to you all.
Visiting house to house, a happy New Year to all.
Los los, a happy New Year to you all. [ Los los is a celebratory exclamation said during Nawruz]
He says, let the one thing become a thousand, and the thousand become countless.
Hands are up in prayer, a happy New Year to you all.
Sumnkhech, Shushp, and Khuzhgmil are the signs of the New Year,
All doors open to each other, a happy New Year to all.
Girls are playing wilchak [game] and boys are playing chiklek [game].
"News from the fire," "News from the square." [Traditional poem in reference to ceremonial square fires]
A happy New Year to you all.
For the farmer, it is time to bring out the bull, plow and sow his seeds.
The housewife throws a spoon on the roof, a happy New Year to you all.
